title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: There is an accessibility issue in the application. To start the functionality of the application, I am required to first click on one of the live areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame. However, I am observing that without clicking on any of these areas, the application does not respond correctly.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should navigate through the different elements of the page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key and observe if it moves the focus between different elements on the page or not.
